Package.UpdateText:
Insert avatars with "file" URL scheme.
When contacts from all acounts displayed in a single list, account resources are children of accounts, not "My Resources" group!
Synchronized with Vacuum-IM: hide URL element if BODY contains it and only it. Added support for standard storage locations in imported options. Added sorting option in IMessageReceiversWidget. Fixed authentication regression.
Package.Name: ru.rwsoftware.eyecu
